articles.description: Erling Haaland scores five as holders Manchester City breeze past Luton to reach the FA Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Haaland scores five as Man City thrash Luton

articles.description: Newcastle beat Blackburn in a dramatic penalty shootout to edge into the FA Cup quarter-finals after a pulsating fifth-round tie at Ewood Park.
articles.title: Newcastle beat Blackburn in shootout thriller

articles.description: A superb extra-time strike from Abdul Fatawu helps Championship leaders Leicester City progress past Bournemouth into the FA Cup quarter-finals.
articles.title: Fatawu stunner helps Leicester past Bournemouth

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag hits back at Jamie Carragher's "subjective" criticism of his tactics in the 2-1 defeat by Fulham.
articles.title: Ten Hag hits back at 'subjective' Carragher criticism

articles.description: Former Wales captain Sam Warburton says Ireland are wearing an "invincibility cloak" in the Six Nations and will not be stopped this year.
articles.title: 'Invincibility cloak means Ireland can't be stopped'

articles.description: Jurgen Klopp says Liverpool's injury list has not improved as Ryan Gravenberch is ruled out of the FA Cup tie against Southampton.
articles.title: Liverpool 'need miracles' with injured players

articles.description: Max Verstappen, Lewis Hamilton and Fernando Alonso are set to define the 2024 F1 season, but there is plenty of interest elsewhere, writes Andrew Benson.
articles.title: F1 2024: Max Verstappen, Lewis Hamilton & Fernando Alonso to define new season

articles.description: Lauren Hemp's double helps England to a routine victory over Italy in a friendly match played in Spain.
articles.title: Lionesses comfortably beat Italy in friendly match

articles.description: England have unearthed two effective spin options in Tom Hartley and Shoaib Bashir, but how do they keep on developing the duo after the tour of India?
articles.title: Why emergence of Hartley & Bashir creates a happy problem

articles.description: Namibia's Jan Nicol Loftie-Eaton breaks the record for the fastest century in T20 international cricket with a 33-ball hundred against Nepal.
articles.title: Loftie-Eaton hits fastest T20 international century
